0.0.2.en: Improved UDP socket handling, added reading all known states
0.0.2.de: Verbessertes UDP Socket Handling, Lesen aller bekannten States hinzugefügt

0.0.3.en: Improved UDP datagram sending, added all known writable states
0.0.3.de: Verbessertes UDP Senden, Schreiben aller bekannten States hinzugefügt

0.2.0.en: added automatic regulation by output photovoltaics unit, limitation of overall power consumption
0.2.0.de: Steuerung in Abhängigkeit der Leistung einer PV-Anlage möglich, Begrezung Ladestrom auf max. Gesamtverbrauch eines Anschlusses

0.2.1.en: handle values of undefined in getStates, better recognition of max power function
0.2.1.de: undefined-Werte in getStates abfangen, bessere Erkennung, ob Leistungsbegrenzng gesetzt

0.2.2.en: display information about photovoltaics automatic also at begin of charging and delayed display when vehicle is plugged (8 sec)
0.2.2.de: Anzeige ob Lade-Automatik aktiv ist bei jedem Ladestart und nun erst verzögert (8 Sek.), wenn Fahrzeug angesteckt wird

0.2.3.en: fix call to display PV automatics after vehicle is plugged, fix object in energy meter states
0.2.3.de: Anzeige der Lade-Automatik bei Anstecken des Fahrzeugs gefixt, Objekte in EnergyMeter-State korrigiert

0.2.4.en: new option for passive mode, set current by 'currtime' command instead of 'curr'
0.2.4.de: Neue Option zum passiven Betrieb der Wallbox, Leistung mit 'currtime'-Kommando anstelle 'curr' regeln

0.2.6.en: retry: set current by 'currtime' command instead of 'curr'

0.3.0.en: regulate wallbox by PV automatics independant from state curr user
0.3.0.de: Regeln der Ladeleistung bei PVoptimiertem Laden unabhngig von curr user

0.3.1.en: fix: when vehicle is plugged, it was always charged for minimum charging time even if PV was low
0.3.1.de: Fix: Auto wurde zumindest immer für Mindesladedauer geladen, auch wenn PV-Leistung nicht ausreicht

0.3.2.en: in PV automatics mode wallbox will be disabled as long as no vehicle is plugged
0.3.2.de: bei PV-Automatik bleibt Wallbox gesperrt solange kein Fahrzeug angeschlossen ist

1.0.0.en: change settings layout to material design, first official version
1.0.0.de: Umstellung Einstallungsdialog auf Material-Design, erste offizielle Version

1.0.1.en: add missing german translation for IP address setting

1.0.2.en: Added readout of last 30 charging sessions from wallbox; enabled 'setenergy' state to send and set charging goal in Wh to wallbox
1.0.2.de: Auslesen der letzten 30 Ladesessions aus Wallbox hinzugefügt; 'setenergy'-Wert zum Setzen eines Ladeziels in Wh in der Wallbox aktiviert

1.0.3.en: new options for minimal amerage (e.g. Renault Zoe) and permanent regard value
1.0.3.de: neue Optionen für Mindeststromstärke (z.B. für Renault Zoe) und dauerhaft zulässigem Netzbezug

1.1.0.en: intermediate results saved as states values, additional power for charging session as state
1.1.0.de: Zwischenergebnisse als states ablegen, dauerhaft zulässiger Netzbezug als State

desc.en: Communicates with a KEBA KeContact wallbox.
desc.de: Kommuniziert mit einer KEBA KeContact Ladestation.

common.name: Product ID
common.desc: Model name (variant)

common.name: Hex Value of Dip Switch 1 Setting
Hex Value of Dip Switch 2 Setting
State
common.desc: Current state of the wallbox

common.name: Error 1
common.desc: Detail code for state 4; exceptions see FAQ on www.kecontact.com

common.name: Error 2
common.desc: Detail code for state 4 exception #6 see FAQ on www.kecontact.com

common.name: Plug
common.desc: Current condition of the loading connection

common.name: Enable System
common.desc: Enable state for charging (contains Enable input, RFID, UDP,..).

common.name: Enable User
common.desc: Enable condition via UDP.

common.name: Maximum Current
common.desc: Current preset value via Control pilot in milliampere.

common.name: Maximum Current Percent
common.desc: Current preset value via Control pilot in % of the PWM value.

common.name: Maximum Current Hardware
common.desc: Highest possible charging current of the charging connection.

common.name: Current User
common.desc: Current preset value of the user via UDP; Default = 63000mA.

common.name: Current for Timer
common.desc: Current value in mA that will replace the setting in the “Curr user” field as soon as “Tmo CT” expires.

common.name: timeout Current Timer
common.desc: Timeout in seconds before the current setting defined by the last currtime command will be applied.

common.name: Current Failsafe
common.desc: Current preset value for the Failsafe function.

common.name: Current Failsafe Timer
common.desc: Communication timeout before triggering the Failsafe function.

common.name: Output
common.desc: State of the relay output X2.

common.name: Input
common.desc: State of the potential free Enable input X1.

common.name: Uptime
common.desc: Current system clock since restart of the wallbox.

common.name: Voltage 1
common.desc: Current voltage in V of phase 1.

common.name: Voltage 2
common.desc: Current voltage in V of phase 2.

common.name: Voltage 3
common.desc: Current voltage in V of phase 3.

common.name: Current 1
common.desc: Current current value in mA of phase 1.

common.name: Current 2
common.desc: Current current value in mA of phase 2.

common.name: Current 3
common.desc: Current current value in mA of phase 3.

common.name: Power
common.desc: Current power in mW (Real Power).

common.name: Power Factor
common.desc: Power factor in % (cosphi)

common.name: Power Consumption
common.desc: Power consumption of the current loading session in Wh.

common.name: Total Power Consumption
common.desc: Total power consumption (persistent) without current loading session in Wh.

common.name: Energy Value to Charge into Battery
common.desc: Energy value in Wh defined by the last setenergy command. Max. value is 99999999 Wh (higher values will cause a counter overflow).

common.name: Authorization Function active
common.desc: Indicates if the Authorization Function is activated

common.name: State of Authorization via RFID
common.desc: Authorization is neccesary (box locked) or already done

common.name: Text to display on wallbox
common.desc: Message to display on wallbox for a certain (short) time (max. 23 characters)

common.name: pause charging of vehicle
common.desc: Switch to stop charging of vehicle. This switch has higher priority than photovoltaics and should be used to stop charging of vehicle

common.name: photovoltaics automatic enabled
common.desc: Switch to load vehicle according to surplus of photovoltaics (true); otherwise load with maximum power (false).

common.name: additional regard to run charging session
common.desc: amount of watts to be used as regard to start charging session

common.name: current surplus for PV automatics
common.desc: Surplus used for last calculation of PV automatics

common.name: maximum power for wallbox
common.desc: maximum amount of watts available for charging station in case of power limitation

common.name: number of current charging phases
common.desc: number of phases with which vehicle is currently charging

common.name: timestamp when vehicle was pluged to wallbox
common.desc: date and time when car was last plugged to wallbox, null if unplugged

common.name: timestamp when vehicle started to charge
common.desc: date and time when car was first started to charge after plugged to wallbox, null if not charging

common.name: timestamp when last charging process was started
common.desc: date and time when car was plugged to wallbox for last charging process

common.name: timestamp when last charging process was finished
common.desc: date and time when car was unplugged from wallbox for last charging process

common.name: charge amount of last charging process
common.desc: Power consumption of the last loading session in Wh.
